name: True Extraction Specification
purpose: Define what complete, faithful extraction means

source.description: Claude Code conversation record for the transcript extraction exercise

principles: Every byte of source content appears in output
Nothing is added that is not in source
Nothing is truncated for any reason
Format may change but content must not

entry_handling.comment: All entry types are included, none filtered

content_handling.comment: No length limits of any kind

field_handling.comment: Every field in source appears in output

formatting.comment: Pretty-printed JSON array of all entries

verification.entry_count: Output entry count must equal input line count
verification.field_preservation: Every field in every input entry must appear in output
verification.no_additions: Output contains only data from source plus mechanical structure

output.description: Complete JSON array of all JSONL entries, no content lost
